description: Summary tables showing the total number of households (a) accepted as owed a main homelessness duty and (b) in temporary accommodation, for the years 1997/98 to 2007/08, (c) rough sleeper estimates for the years 1998 to 2007, for each local authority, including South Tyneside and Gateshead, and (d) rough sleeper estimates by Government Office region.
department: Dept for Communities and Local Government
